ygData.subject: RE: Money issues
ygData.msgSnippet: You and your warrior friend probably won t get any exp unless you kill some of the dwarves that are on the island since the sisters are probably around 12-14th
ygData.messageBody:
You and your warrior friend probably won't get any exp unless you kill some
of the dwarves that are on the island since the sisters are probably around
12-14th level; i'm not sure what level the dwarves are, but the man and
woman on the right side of the island from the dock are blue at 28th.

-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 8:31 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues


From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>

What Lvls are they? Can me at 20th and a L17 warrior friend of mine camp on
this island ok and get ok eps?



>
> Killing Sisters of Erroliss(sp?) in the OOT(first stop going to BB on the
> boat) is a realy good place to go for money. Load up on purity belts bind
> yourself to the docks sell them in Freeport(for 5pp or so), I sold them in
> gfay, had better luck selling them to PC's there at 5pp, or just sell them
> to NPC's in the Freeport Necro Guild. They sell for about 1pp a peice to
the
> merchants there, at least for my gnome necro. Those belts funded my FBR!
>
> Hope this helps,
> -Araxen 24 Gnome Necro on Tunare


This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
